basics.name: Yury Savin
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: I am a professional web developer with 3+ years of experience. I have experience with front-end (ES6, TypeScript, React.JS) and back-end (Node.JS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis), but I prefer to do front-end.

work.summary: Development of a web application for internal use in the contact centers of the company
highlights: Main stack: PHP, JS, jQuery, MySQL
Developed and implemented a gamification system by which sales in the contact center increased by 20%
Designed and developed web GUI for reporting, using React.js and Node.js
Designed and developed front-end for 10+ websites, using HTML, CSS, jQuery, and MODx
Developed android mobile app 'Schedule for university students'

education.studyType: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

publications.name: Development of a system for monitoring the performance of operators in contact centers
publications.publisher: Federal State Budget Educational Institution of Higher Professional Education Sholom-Aleichem Priamursky State University
publications.summary: The article describes the developing a comprehensive automated system for monitoring the performance of contact center operators. The system allows real-time monitoring of KPI of contact center operators, such as the number of calls, the average handle time, the percentage of additional sales.
